articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil dips, reversing gains after bearish U.S. economic data - CNBC
articles.description: Oil prices rose in volatile trade on Tuesday as worries about tight fuel supplies ahead of winter offset investor concerns about lower demand in China.
articles.content: Oil prices fell on Tuesday in choppy trading, reversing earlier gains as U.S. consumer prices unexpectedly rose in August, giving cover for the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver another hefty interest … [+2810 chars]
